Package ohos.agp.animation.timelinecurves

Class SpringCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.timelinecurves.SpringCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animator.TimelineCurve

    public class SpringCurve
extends Object
implements Animator.TimelineCurve
    Indicates the spring curve.
    Since:
    5

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SpringCurve​()
      Default constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance.
      SpringCurve​(float stiffness, float damping)
      A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness and damping of the spring.
      SpringCurve​(float stiffness, float damping, float endPos)
      A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness, damping, and end position (rest position) of the spring.
      SpringCurve​(float stiffness, float damping, float endPos, float velocity)
      A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness, damping, end position (rest position), and start velocity of the spring.
      SpringCurve​(float stiffness, float damping, float endPos, float velocity, float valueThreshold)
      A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness, damping, end position (rest position), start velocity, and displacement threshold of the spring.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float getCurvedTime​(float time)
      Obtains the curve value at the specified the normalized time.
      long getDuration​()
      Obtains the estimated duration of the spring movement.

      • SpringCurve

        public SpringCurve​()
        Default constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance.
        Since:

      • SpringCurve

        public SpringCurve​(float stiffness,
                   float damping)
        A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness and damping of the spring.
        Parameters:
        stiffness - Indicates the stiffness of the spring, which is greater than 0.
        damping - Indicates the damping of the spring, which is greater than 0.
        Since:
        5

      • SpringCurve

        public SpringCurve​(float stiffness,
                   float damping,
                   float endPos)
        A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness, damping, and end position (rest position) of the spring.
        Parameters:
        stiffness - Indicates the stiffness of the spring.
        damping - Indicates the damping of the spring.
        endPos - Indicates the end position (rest position) of the spring.
        Since:
        5

      • SpringCurve

        public SpringCurve​(float stiffness,
                   float damping,
                   float endPos,
                   float velocity)
        A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness, damping, end position (rest position), and start velocity of the spring.
        Parameters:
        stiffness - Indicates the stiffness of the spring.
        damping - Indicates the damping of the spring.
        endPos - Indicates the end position (rest position) of the spring.
        velocity - Indicates the start velocity of the spring.
        Since:
        5

      • SpringCurve

        public SpringCurve​(float stiffness,
                   float damping,
                   float endPos,
                   float velocity,
                   float valueThreshold)
        A constructor used to create a SpringCurve instance, by specifying the stiffness, damping, end position (rest position), start velocity, and displacement threshold of the spring.
        Parameters:
        stiffness - Indicates the stiffness of the spring.
        damping - Indicates the damping of the spring.
        endPos - Indicates the end position (rest position) of the spring.
        velocity - Indicates the start velocity of the spring.
        valueThreshold - Indicates the displacement threshold of the spring.
        Since:
        5

    • Method Detail

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration​()
        Obtains the estimated duration of the spring movement.
        Returns:
        Returns the estimated duration, in ms.
        Since:
        5

      • getCurvedTime

        public float getCurvedTime​(float time)
        Obtains the curve value at the specified the normalized time.
        Specified by:
        getCurvedTime in interface Animator.TimelineCurve
        Parameters:
        time - Indicates the normalized time.
        Returns:
        Returns a value higher than 1.0 if the curve value overshoots the target value; returns a value lower than 0 if the curve value undershoots the target value.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        AnimatorProperty.setCurve(TimelineCurve curve), AnimatorValue.setCurve(TimelineCurve curve), AnimatorGroup.setCurve(TimelineCurve curve)
